query:
SELECT
                v.id,
                v.title,
                v.youtube_id,
                v.duration,
                v.views,
                COALESCE(array_agg(c.name) FILTER (WHERE c.name IS NOT NULL), '{}') as "categories: Vec<String>"
            FROM videos v
            LEFT JOIN video_categories vc ON v.id = vc.video_id
            LEFT JOIN categories c ON vc.category_id = c.id
            GROUP BY v.id
            ORDER BY v.title ASC;
